page.title: 03CLACTON PIER
page.content: Clacton Pier is about 1 mile long. It is Â£3 to go on the pier and 30 pence to walk on it. There are lots of fun packed amusements on the pier. When the rollercoaster first came it was a great attraction to lots of people.But unfortunately they had to take down the helterskelter. On the 21st. June 1985 the killer whale was taken off the pier it went to Windsor Safari Park where the pool is much bigger. They are soon putting a pool where the killer whale was, with a big water slide and juccuzi, and taking the sea lion away. At night on the pier, there is a Disco called Oscars. There is also a big wheel, speedway, umbrellas and lots more rides. It is open daily from 10 o'clock to 6 o'clock. The Ice skating is on the pier in the winter. All in all, well worth a visit!
